body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Eric Martinez and I work for Golden Motors.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Shirley Wood.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Shirley. Can you please provide me with your email address and phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is swood@example.com and my phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Shirley.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Now, could you also tell me your home address and date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my home address is one two three Main Street, Anytown, and my date of birth is the twenty-fifth of December, nineteen eighty.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that, Shirley.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your time today. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Eric. Have a great day too! Bye.
